name: Stay Up Late
description: This variation on the Tom Collins is super-simple to make. It appeared in the 1946 Stork Club Bar Book by Lucius Beebe—we got this version of the recipe from Theo Lieberman of Lantern's Keep in NYC.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces London Dry gin such as Beefeater
1/2 ounce cognac such as Pierre Ferrand

recipeInstructions.text: Add lemon juice, simple syrup, gin, and cognac to a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice, then shake briefly.
Strain into a ice-filled collins glass. Top with club soda, garnish with brandied cherry and orange wedge, serve with a straw.
